snippet.title: Ghost Bike - Official Reveal Trailer | Annapurna Interactive Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Ghost Bike puts players in the shoes of a streetwise kid from Freehub City on a mission to revive the last of the Ghost Bikes, the magical couriers who rode between the world of the living and the world of the dead. Ride the Ghost Bike to the afterlife, and save the lost souls of Wheel World.
